scripts.build: npm run evolve && npm run evolve-less && npm run wiki && npm run wiki-less
scripts.build-debug: npm run evolve-debug && npm run evolve-less && npm run wiki-debug && npm run wiki-less
scripts.build-win: npm run evolve && npm run evolve-less-win && npm run wiki && npm run wiki-less-win
scripts.build-debug-win: npm run evolve-debug && npm run evolve-less-win && npm run wiki-debug && npm run wiki-less-win
scripts.evolve-less: lessc src/evolve.less evolve/evolve-unminified.css && csso -i evolve/evolve-unminified.css -o evolve/evolve.css && rm evolve/evolve-unminified.css
scripts.evolve-less-win: lessc src/evolve.less evolve/evolve-unminified.css && csso -i evolve/evolve-unminified.css -o evolve/evolve.css && del evolve\evolve-unminified.css
scripts.wiki-less: lessc src/wiki/wiki.less wiki/wiki-unminified.css && csso -i wiki/wiki-unminified.css -o wiki/wiki.css && rm wiki/wiki-unminified.css
scripts.wiki-less-win: lessc src/wiki/wiki.less wiki/wiki-unminified.css && csso -i wiki/wiki-unminified.css -o wiki/wiki.css && del wiki\wiki-unminified.css
scripts.deploy: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && cp -r *.html *.ico LICENSE evolve lib font strings wiki dist && gh-pages -d dist
scripts.deploy-win: (rmdir /S /Q dist || echo recreating dist) && mkdir dist && xcopy /E /I evolve dist\evolve && xcopy /E /I font dist\font && xcopy /E /I lib dist\lib && xcopy /E /I strings dist\strings && xcopy /E /I wiki dist\wiki && copy *.html dist && copy *.ico dist && copy LICENSE dist && gh-pages -d dist
